description: Hikaru Ichijyo is Japanese. Hikaru grew up with his father as a talented aerobatic flier, having won seven amateur flying contests by the age of 16 in 2009. When his "senpai" http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker] invited him to the launch ceremony of the http://anidb.net/ch21733 [SDF-1 Macross] he found himself pulled into a galactic war against an alien race called the Zentradi. He later joins the UN Spacy after a talk with http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker] and http://anidb.net/ch7418 [Lynn Minmay]. Shortly after joining, he gains a reputation as a skilled pilot and leader, and he is promoted to second lieutenant and later first lieutenant. He pilots the http://anidb.net/ch48790 [VF-1S Valkyrie] "Skull One" after the death of http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker], and is eventually promoted to captain at the end of the series.Source: wiki
name: Ichijou Hikaru
